text:
Aw yeah! Today we're learning English with Will 
Smith in the hit American movie Independence Day.

Just so you know, if you're new here, every 
week we help you to understand fast speaking

natives. Without getting lost, without missing 
the jokes and without subtitles. Like Himadri,

who says that this is the place for 
learners to take their English vocabulary

and pronunciation to the next level. 
So what are you waiting for? Hit that

Subscribe button and the Bell down bellow, 
so you don't miss any of our new lessons.

Let me ask you. Do you ever feel confused or lost 
when you listen to natives? We don't exactly speak

like you learn in school? We don't pronounce 
everything like you were expecting? You miss

words and in real life, natives just speak 
so fast, right? Well, how would you like to

be able to understand natives even when we speak 
really fast? Well we have a 3-Part Masterclass,

that it'll teach you the three keys to being 
able to understand natives at any speed. And

the best part is you can sign up for FREE 
by clicking up here or down the description

below. And we look forward to seeing you 
inside! Now let's get back to the lesson.

Hey, are you a fan of Will Smith? Well, 
so are we. And that's why we have this

playlist full of lessons with this amazing 
American actor. You can check that out after

you finish this lesson by clicking up 
here or down the scription box below.
